website_summaries.verdict: Its thin construction is a trade-off: easy to float on and off the pool surface, but it deteriorates quickly after a couple of swim seasons.
pros: Brings above-ground pools’ temperature up by 8 to 10 degrees on sunny days
An added plus: it catches debris that would otherwise sink in the pool, making fallen leaves and twigs easier to clear away
Lightweight and easy to put on
cons: Cover’s heat-retaining bubbles deteriorate quickly in sunny, hot climates
Cover is very thin and may blow off the pool in high winds

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! I have a 24 foot above ground pool & had another solar cover I had been using that was for my old 22 ft pool. I decided & upgrade & soo glad I did! I live in Ohio & the pool temp had been right around 72 degrees. I put on this new over & it raised the temp 10 degrees overnight! Then, I went on vacation for a week & when I returned the pool temp was 94 degrees! It raised the water temp over 20 degrees in a week. Wish I would have purchased this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: I called the seller and it sounds like this was a known problem that they say has ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the Spring of 2016 and by June of 2017 the bubbles had begun to pop and the plastic disintegrated into my pool. I called the seller and it sounds like this was a known problem that they say has now been fixed. They replaced the cover for no charge (they usually charge shipping but I live local to their warehouse and I picked it up), which is why the review is 3 stars instead of 1. Now I'll wait to see if this one actually holds up; it seems much thinner and lighter than the original. Seems to work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: sotus

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fits my 18' round pool. No overlap. I find that if I keep it on 2 days in a row the pool is completely heated. The trick is don't run your pool during the day. Let the cover sit on the pool, come home from work and run your filter. The the first 12 to 24 inches of water are very warm under the cover. Let that water circulate for about 10 minutes. Do the same thing again the next day, and your good to go. This cover also keeps water and chemicals from evaporating. Seems very sturdy. Hoping to get 3 seasons out of it before he chemicals start to eat away at it.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 months only.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 4 months in the sun, then it completely fell apart leaving blue trash all over my pool for me to clean out. Expect this to only last a season at best. When it worked, it worked great, the pool was very hot in fact if left on for a few days in the sun. Just do not expect it to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: PAPA.AMGTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable and expected quality at this price point, we'll see
customer_reviews.text: 1/3 the price of a 16 mil cover that lasted only three seasons. So if this can last three seasons I'll be happy. Yes, it's lightweight, but trust me, the 16 mil was a pain to get on and off the pool, and even harder to fold. Be gentle when pulling this off, pull parallel with the seams, not perpendicular. That way you're not pulling apart the seams, your pulling with them. No tears yet and I've had it a couple months now. I'll add the fifth star if I can get the aforementioned three seasons out of it.
customer_reviews.author: thepiratemorgan

customer_reviews.title: but I felt this was a waste of money for sure
customer_reviews.text: The cover sinks just a little bit under the water. It does not sit on top of the water. Very flimsy. We bought this, because we had a 12mm cover that was so heavy, we couldn't get it on an off without extra help. It could be the brand, but I felt this was a waste of money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: It was PERFECT for our Memorial Day picnic yesterday
customer_reviews.text: While still bulky and hard for one woman to handle completely by herself, it is doable, certainly easier to do than the heavier counterparts... It warmed our pool quickly! We have had warm temps here (high 80's and 90's for several days, but it took our pool from 68 degrees to 88 in 5 days. It was PERFECT for our Memorial Day picnic yesterday! Hoping it lasts a good three years, as it's supposed too... it is pretty thin.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. For this that say it only warms the ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my pool about a month before winter was over. When installed water was 52° F. With no weather over 80° F the water was ready for swimming around 70° F in the first or second day of true summer weather. Highly recommend. For this that say it only warms the top layer of water this is true but when the pump circulates the water it of course mixes it all together. Saved me from buying and running an electric pool heater.
customer_reviews.author: DisturbedDragon

customer_reviews.title: Blue Wave 24-Feet Round, 8 mil Solar Blanket for a 24" round above ground pool
customer_reviews.text: We have had an above ground pool for 6 years now. We have had the 12 ml covers, and they don't hold up any better than the Blue Wave 24-feet Round 8-mil Solar Blanket has. So far, so good. This cover keeps the pool cleaner, is very easy to roll up- even I can do it by myself, and that is a great help when I am alone in the daytime, wanting to take a swim! It is not as thick, of course, but so far it seems to be just as durable as the 12 mil cover that we used for 2 summers. I expect to get two more summers out of this blanket, as well!
customer_reviews.author: Carol O.

customer_reviews.title: Great pool cover, much warmer now.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Intex 18' round easy up pool. It does it's job, the water is noticeably warmer with this cover on, probably 10-15 degrees. The cover is slightly larger than my pool surface, but I think that has more to do with the pool not being set up on level ground and therefore not being a perfect, or full, circle. The quality seems more than acceptable for an item that will be moved on a regular basis. I will review at the end of the summer to speak to the durability. I would definitely buy this again as it is much better than the silly pool cover that came with the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Homestead Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great solar cover
customer_reviews.text: We bought our solar cover for a 33ft above ground pool. It does take two of us to get it on and off just because of the size and we roll it up as we take it off. We helps a lot keeping the pool clean when the leaves are starting to fall. It keeps the temperature up depending on how much sun is shining on it, if it gets sun all day it will go up a good 10 degrees. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the money
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was planning on replacing our 4year old solar cover with a more expensive, thicker clear solar cover. But none of the reviews justified spending over $100 for a cover so I went with this cover for under $70 and it works just fine. I just Opened our pool a week ago, had to refill about 1/3 of the water, and with rainy weather this week the solar cover helped raise the water temp almost 10degrees. Good enough for me.and ordering from Amazon saved me a trip to the pool store. Win win
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: only used a few times
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and used it a few times shortly after setting up the pool but quickly figured out that we would not be using it as much as we planned. It is now sitting out behind my storage shed not in use. We originally purchased to help warm the pool up and decrease the amount of leaves making it into the pool. I'm not sure if it helped warm the pool up but it might have. Over the course of a couple days with this installed the pool seemed to warm up a bit when the sun was out but then the weather improved and we stopped using this.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this cover. I bought the slightly larger cover (pool is 20 ft, I got the 24 ft. cover.) and it overlaps top ring so when it's windy, the cover stays on. The water is very warm the first 10-12 inches down which is perfect for shock value when you first get in, but cooler water on the bottom is great on these hot 102 degree days. I would recommend this cover to anyone and everyone! Pretty light weight so no problem with just one person taking it off and putting it back on!
customer_reviews.author: CRobyn81

customer_reviews.title: Falling Apart
customer_reviews.text: Had this a year now. After the first 2 months, it started to fall apart. Little blue plastic dots all over the pool. Used it again this year and WOW. Little blue dots galore. Spend an hour getting them all out of the pool. Sad, very sad. Oh, yes it helps to increase the pool temp, as long as you keep it covered.
customer_reviews.author: kaye l adamson

customer_reviews.title: Size durability and heating
customer_reviews.text: Got this cover for our 18’ pool to replace our old one that had holes. This one is smaller than the pool which lets everything in this is listed as the same size as the others I have purchased in the past but is much smaller. Also it is not helping heat the pool. Our old one with the holes had the pool warmer. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Mixed emotions
customer_reviews.text: I have a 24 ft above ground pool so I usually buy a 28 ft cover. All I could find was this one. My yard is full of 60 foot pecan trees so the extra 4 feet allowed cover to hang over edge. I would wash all the leaves pecans etc to rear of pool suction off water and put debris in trash. Obviously this one doesn’t over hang pool sides but it’s light enough I can flip trailing edge over drag whole cover off and dump debris. Very light weight so we’ll see how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm water to swim in, finally, yay!
customer_reviews.text: So i had my doubts about a solar cover, considering all it really is, is a stronger version of bubble wrap. Our water was able to be swam in, it was just to cold, so i bought a blue wave 18-feet round 8-mil solar cover. After two days the water was great! We learned that the best way to use it is to have it on all the time, unless the pool is being used, and to run the pool pump after the sun goes down (maximizes sunlight going into the pool). I would definately say get one if you dont like to swim in cold water!
customer_reviews.author: Si1verstorm

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected what a hassle
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I liked about this pool cover I could have went to the moving store and purchase bubble wrap that's all this is they apparently don't make the type of solar covers that they used to you can handle it by yourself this you need to people don't like it would like to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Great for 14' pool
customer_reviews.text: We have got this oversized for a 14' pool because pine tree above it sheds plenty of debris and "exact fit" makes debris fall into the pool along edges. Oversized cover acts both as a "heat retainer" and as a "full secured cover". It had no issues with "popping bubbles" this first season, but we also made sure it stays in shade when removed. It is easy to take off and put back on when two people do it, but it can be also removed and applied by a single person, it will just take more steps walking around.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gagarina

customer_reviews.title: Edges not seamed
customer_reviews.text: 18' Aboveground Round cover. Product came on time, but the outer edge was not seamed as the previous solar pool cover from Intex was, but Intex cover failed after one full year. Purchased Blue Wave cover as advertising states 3 season/year cover, but doesn't seem to be any thicker than Intex cover only time will tell. Unfortunately Blue Wave is nearly double the price of Intex, so need Blue Wave to last 2 years/seasons to be of value. Item of note, wish those who engineer the folding of pool cover was a user of trying to unfold cover on pool.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Doesn't sink with filter running.
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away at how well this works for the price. It's easy to use and I can run my filter with it on and it absolutelyis worth the time as it absolutely keeps the heat in the pool at night as well as help warm it during the day. I'll enjoy a longer swim season this year. The last one I had would sink with my filter running. I'll update later with how well it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not cut properly
customer_reviews.text: This thing was supposed to be better than the intex cover. I've gone through an intex cover every 3 years or so. This was supposed to last longer. The quality didn't seem any better or of the package. I unfolded it and put it in. I don't know how they measure, but it's cut completely unevenly and won't sit flat on the pool as it needs to. I'm returning it and getting another intex solar cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY, VERY CHEAP PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in Aug of 2020. When I received my 24' Round solar blanket order, it was only 15ft round and made very very cheaply. Flimsy. And almost 150.00. I reordered from "In the Swim" and the blanket was half the price and such a better quality solar blanket that actually works. Do not waste your money purchasing this Blue Wave junk, it all sounded great, but was NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pool stays nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time we have used a solar blanket and will never go without again! The pool stays nice and warm. My husband and I roll it up to one end and then unroll back over the water when we are done swimming. Also, surprised how clean the water stays considering the pool is surrounded by trees. Just a few leaves/debris around the edges. We were a little worried that it would keep the water from cycling through the skimmer/filter/chlorinator, but as long as the water level doesn't get to low it is fine. It is holding up very well to the salt water system.
customer_reviews.author: Skapunker82

customer_reviews.title: I can highly recommend this solar blanket
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover 2 years ago and I have to say it really works. It warms up the water a few degrees, keeps it warmer than it would be without the cover and also keeps dirt out of the pool. We also need to use less chemicals than we used to. We have the cover on until we are ready to use the pool, the pool is warm and clean. In the winter we store the cover in our garage so it is ready to be used again in the summer. I can highly recommend this solar blanket! Great quality, still intact and nothing broken.
customer_reviews.author: D. Steinemann

customer_reviews.title: A bit more costly, but it'll last longer, so it saves money in the end!
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I highly recommend to anyone looking to get their pool temps up faster and anyone who wishes to extend the pool season. The thicker quality of this product makes for a more sturdy and longer lasting cover than the pool manufacturer cover that is like this one. It does the job nicely, and is easy to deploy and store. Can't ask for much more! You'll pay a bit more for this one, but you will not be sorry because it will last you for years more than the others!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny then some!
customer_reviews.text: This heated our pop up 14 foot pool to almost 90° last summer!! Sooooo glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Thomason

customer_reviews.title: This worked great on my pool this last summer
customer_reviews.text: This worked great on my pool this last summer. I could instantly tell the pool was at least 10 degree warmer then without this blanket. It works great as a pool cover to. I stopped using my cover as it would always fall off from even mild winds and I never had that kind of issue with this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Treece

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: This cover works well and is one of the few out there that has some UV protection. This is a new one to replace the last one I bought (same exact one). The only downside is don't expect it to last more than three years. At just over a $100 bucks I'm fine with this. For $35 a season to help keep the pool warm is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ja1724

customer_reviews.title: Raises temp and totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: For Sacramento hot climate, this blanket worked perfectly. Last year my pool averaged 75-78 degrees for the summer, this year with the blanket it got up to 88 degrees! So I’ve been going back and forth with leaving the blanket on and keeping it off to maintain a comfortable pool temp. I’ve only had it for a few months so I don’t know about durability. So far it’s held up well and hasn’t broken down, but for the price, I’d be willing to buy a new one each summer just for the ease, price, and heating efficiency. I also noticed I don’t have to fill up the pool as much as the blanket helps preventing evaporation.
customer_reviews.author: N Gio

customer_reviews.title: Keep the heat in your pool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pool cover to keep the heat in our 18 foot above ground pool. I have made a solar panel to heat the water during the day but you need a solar cover the keep the heat in the pool at night so you don't lose the heat . Works great and a great value ! L Baker
customer_reviews.author: Lewis b

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time, easy to remove. Bought this products to replace our old solar cover. We have 24' pool, purchased 24' cover ..IT DOES NOT FIT, seems to be thinner than previous covers. Not worth the money spent, Very disappointed. This cover would fit a 22' pool better.
customer_reviews.author: dalpurple

customer_reviews.title: Great solar cover!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this cover! We had a cheaper one and it barely lasted the season before littering blue dots all over our yard. This is the 2nd season with this one! Highly recommend, warms up the pool, keep it on overnight and it keeps the warmth in.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP - DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased many solar covers this by far is the worst one we have ever bought. It is SO CHEAP and we will be lucky if we get through the summer with it --- do not waste your time on this one --- IT IS CHEAP!!!! The saying goes - you get what you pay for -- this one fits into that category -- but worse!!!
customer_reviews.author: Capital Fam

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is very thin and seems to be falling apart within a week. We thought we were upgrading and apparently we were not the last one we had lasted 3 years and this one isn't going to last a month. I wanted to contact the seller but can't seem to! It sticks together and all the bubbles are flat!
customer_reviews.author: Myrazz

customer_reviews.title: But I'm fine with that
customer_reviews.text: I put my pool up at the end of May (it's 12'x42"). All through June, the temp of the pool never went above 76 degrees. Into the first week of July, when the temperature was well above 80, the pool never seemed to get warm. I put this cover on the pool, and by the end of the next day the pool was at 80. It has not really gone above 80. But I'm fine with that. Pros: It works Since the cover floats, it's very easy to put in and take out Lightweight, but durable Cons: No instructions Not a perfect circle -- does require some trimming of material to fit correctly
customer_reviews.author: Formerly Gluten-free dad

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one year, give me tiny blue pieces of plastic the 2nd year.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly feel that a product that you only use for a few months out of the year should last more than one Summer. First year we had no problems, year number 2 (this Summer) comes around and half way through the season, I find tiny little blue pieces floating around every where in my pool and the cover begins to fall apart. I will say that while this cover was in one piece, it did preform well and did heat my pool during the day and keep my pool from losing heat during the night. I just wish it was made with a little more quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Nice

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst solar cover I have ever had. It does not stay in place and gathers in a ball. It is extremely light weight so water gathers on the top and it can sink down in those places at least a foot.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber3907

customer_reviews.title: Heats the top 6 inches or so about 8 to ...
customer_reviews.text: Heats the top 6 inches or so about 8 to 10 degrees and helps keep the leaves out. If using with a salt water pool it seems to keep the chlorine gasses trapped in if that makes scene. Just suggest to let the pool breath once a day.
customer_reviews.author: JESSE

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace our intex cover of the same type which was out of stock at the time. It is definitely not as thick or sturdy as the Intex but it does a pretty decent job as far as covers go. I read some reviews likening similar items to bubble wrap. This is definitely not anything like bubblewrap. Another perk is that it came rolled up in a bag for packaging which I think I can use for storage once our pool is drained. It does tend to ripple a little ijln the middle if the filter is on but it's still a value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable solar cover, works great for extending our pool season in Michigan.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this cover for an entire Michigan Summer and it has worked well. This cover is much more durable than our previous solar covers and reasonably priced for the durability. It shows no signs of weather, cracking or distress after being in full sun all summer. We have been able to open the pool much earlier and leave it open later since it provides a few extra degrees of warmth. We will store it for the winter and utilize our winter cover. We look forward to many more summers of warm pool water!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Heats the water up!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 20 ft round above ground pool. To apply and remove the cover it is fairly easy with 2 people. This product delivers what it was intended for. It reduces the amount of sand and debris. Most importantly, for our family, it warmed the water very well. The entire pool was luke warm. The cover was laid out all day with the pump running. So, in the evening around 7pm we went swimming and the kids absolutely loved the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy until you read this!
customer_reviews.text: All this is, is a rough cut piece of bubble wrap. They taped it closed with duct tape, so it ripped the thin plastic coming off. It looks NOTHING like the photos in the description. Do not get ripped off...DO NOT BUY THIS GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! It heats up the top of the pool really well. After turning on the pump to mix the water, our pool has been in the low 80s all summer. It has been really comfortable. I was concerned it would not keep debris out of the pool since it just laid on top. It works better than the Intex cover that came with it. We hardly ever get any debris. It is also easy to take off. It works best with two people to fold it over onto itself and pull it out (that's the best method we found) but one person can do it easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Webb

customer_reviews.title: Beware. Pool stays warmer with 12 mil and not 8 mil
customer_reviews.text: Way too thin and light. Made pool temperature drop at night. Thought this was gonna be thick like the first one I bought 3 years ago. They must have given me 12 mil by mistake cause the 8 mil is definitely thinner. Picked up a clear 12 mil at a local pool store and now my pool stays warm. If I would've known I would've bought 12 mil in the first place. Had to return the 8 mil solar blanket for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: toledo shopper

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well. Going for season 3 in 2020.
customer_reviews.text: Recently completed Ohio USA summer season two with this cover. 18 foot above ground pool. It is ready for season three next summer.
customer_reviews.author: B Richter

customer_reviews.title: It is a pain but it does work
customer_reviews.text: It is so big.i didn’t think about the difficulty that would be for me to put in and take out each time we swim. It definitely works though. I had it on top of my pool and the pump wasn’t running For a day while I mowed. The pool was hotter than bath water. I could hardly stand it. I got in and mixed up the top and bottom part of the water and it became warm instead of hot so it was swimmable.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Helps a bit
customer_reviews.text: This one is all blue and doesnt seem to heat as much as our old one. I am guessing maybe because the other one had a black side to attract the sun. It helps a bit but not sure I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit (I have a round 24 foot by 52" above ground pool), came packaged nicely and left on my porch, exactly what you'd expect a solar cover to be. Smooth side faces up and the "bubble" side faces down into the water. warms up the water during the day and keeps the heat trapped at night. Good product for a fraction of the cost you'd pay in a brick and motor pool supply store.
customer_reviews.author: kschultz3315

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't real impressed with this product because (for us) it didn't do what it claims. To me it is just a big roll of bubble wrap cover for your pool. It works great for a pool cover, but it didn't warm up our pool at all.
customer_reviews.author: toby

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This cover was exactly what I had expected. Was cut well to fit a 28' above ground pool with no modification needed. We hear our pool to 85 and bought this to save the radiation cooling at night. I figured it might pay for itself in the electrical savings... It has certainly done that and more. I had to turn the heater down because of complaints the pool was getting to warm. With the cover and the heater the pool would climb into the 90s and we live in New England. The hot summer days have not even hit yet... So we have turned our heater down to 80 and are saving a ton on electricity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good solar cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this product ! Does it's job and keeps the pool temp at a good level. I attached pvc pipe to the side of the pool to hold the cover when we are in the pool. One person can easily take the cover on and off. So far its very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The key to using the solar cover is to leave your filter running. If you don't, the pool temp will warm up but only the top 2-3 inches. Also we have a 16-ft pool and this 15-ft fits perfectly. I'm sure had we bought a 16 it would be hanging over the edges. The warm up I would say is about 5° which doesn't sound like a lot but when you go from 75° water to 80° there's a huge difference. Fast forward to 6/11/2015 My solar cover is still in gr8 shape and is still warming the pool. It's not falling apart like I've read on some other reviews. Perhaps they use heavier chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: lor7549

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough good things about this solar cover. I live in the north east and have had trouble in past summers getting and keeping my pool temp up. Any progress I made during the hot days would quickly fade with a thunderstorm and 1 night below 70. Since I have been using this my pool temperature stays between 84 and 90. I actually have to leave cover off a night or 2 to cool pool down. Also, after several months of use I still have not had to add any water to my pool. This product is amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Robert Worley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box we put on an inter 12' pool. In ONE day we had raised water temp by 6 degrees! B4 we used an inter cover but never had this result. Cover is thick bubbles r condensed, and it actually measures 13' diameter so it laps the walls. We live in sw fla. and daily high was 90 degrees...FYI
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy material!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst!! 21 ft of flimsy material to try to roll up and remove. One person could never do it. Temperature outside has been in the 80's. Pool temperature is 78. What an absolute waste of money. Not to myself...do not buy again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: I wish we bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: This solar blanket heats up the pool!!! Almost too much!!! Not really. We've drained it a few inches a couple times when it was over 90 degrees in the pool to put cold fresh water in. It actually works great that way because the pool becomes cleared with the fresh water. This solar blanket has worked great all summer and I wish we had it last summer. Our pool now stays around 82-86 degrees unless its a week of straight 95-100 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi A

customer_reviews.title: Hoping it will do the job and last.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace our Intex solar cover that had lasted 2,5 summers. This Blue Wave product is thinner, does not fit well (about 8 inches too long), and does not have holes in it (allowing rain water to run through and making it easier to take off daily). Being thinner, I can only hope this cover will do what it is supposed to, and will last at least 2 summers.
customer_reviews.author: Norskico

customer_reviews.title: It Works! Pool is nice and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 15 ft pool so it would hang over the sides and help keep my pool clean while heating it. We used a regular cover last year and it took forever for the water to get warm, not the case with this cover. Our pool was warm within a day. However, if we leave the cover on most of the day, instead of taking it off first thing in the morning, our pool is like getting into an almost hot bath which isn't very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: The Brittons

customer_reviews.title: Thin but good
customer_reviews.text: Its thinner than my last one, but that makes it easier to manage. it fit the pool like a glove (give it a week of use before you go trimming it) - The odd thing is that I cant seem to get my pool over 80... even after 4 days of 90+ weather it just doesnt want to get hotter. Wondering if its because this is thinner? anyway.. Overall I am happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: 28' Round 8-mil Solar Blanket
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new solar pool cover. My old one was 6 mils and had holes in it. The NS125 is advertised at 8 mils. Perfect I wanted one a little heaver. However the one I received, marked NS125 measured 3.5 to 4 mils, not quite as heavy. It feels like you are going to tear holes it when installing it. I would not buy a Blue Wave Product again.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move.
customer_reviews.text: This worked better than expected. I first used it to keep chemical levels up while away for 10 days. Now I'm using it to keep the water warmer as fall approaches. It is light enough that I can pull it off and put it back on in a matter of minutes without assistance, and I'm not young. I like that it also helps keep bugs out of pool.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA MILLIGAN

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 4 months of use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover back on April 30th, 2018 and its already sun rotted . There are tears and holes and pieces of the plastic bubbles are floating on the surface and in the skimmer. It's garbage after the season is over . The covers we purchased in the past lasted about 3 years but were a little more expensive. Don't waste your money on this cover!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mongan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 14' x 48" Summer Waves above-ground pool. I'm glad i ignored the negative reviews because it has been great so far. I've had it for a week and it heats up our pool quite nicely. I also like how it keeps a good amount of debris out of the pool. I bought the 15' cover and used scissors to trim the excess so that it fits perfectly on the surface. The quality seems good and it is easy to remove/put on by one person.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Not what expected. Looks like giant roll of tiny bubble wrap. I understood there was mild cutting to fit, but didn’t say you had to piece together and have multiple pieces to put and cover a pool. I thought it was 18’ wide at least like our pool but it appears it is only 4.5’ wide and you have to cut down one side then put at least 2 pieces to make width. It is light but not what I thought I was buying.
customer_reviews.author: Allessandra Phillips

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: It really does work!!! Seriously, last season we had to force ourselves to use the pool because it was so cold!!! This last season we used this and it made a world of difference! You couldn't keep us out of the pool! We even had a few night swimming sessions until the bats started coming out that is. You won't regret it!!! We live in Colorado so I can only imagine how nice it would be in hotter states!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany719

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: In one day my pool water went from 80 to 90 degrees. I’m so happy with this purchase. I’ve had my pool for a month but haven’t been able to utilize it because the water was so cold.
customer_reviews.author: Candie_gurl7

customer_reviews.title: Thin solar blanket, not very effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same solar blanket from same seller previously, but this one is thinner and less effective than the one I received prior. Does not heat up the pool water as well or as fast, I think because it is thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Betz

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off. Adds 10 degrees or more to surface water in the sun. Keeps debris out. Perfect cover when I shock my 18ft 6k gallon above ground pool at night. Looks nice. Used 2 months so far, zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Pixel

customer_reviews.title: Fits great does the job
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my above ground pool and also keeps the heat in from the sun so that I am able to get at least 5 degrees or more in temp rise to the water when this cover is on and it is a sunny day
customer_reviews.author: D Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, keeps the temp comfortable and pool clean. Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This worked great at holding the daytime warmth in the pool overnight. I don't how many degrees warmer, but we went from grimacing from the chill and inching into our pool, to saying "aahhhhhh" and just jumping right in. The bonus we didn't expect... it is very light (compared to our 'fitted' cover) and super easy to put on, which meant we used it every night. While it doesn't go over the edges of the pool, it covers almost every bit of the surface area, so it keeps the pool a lot cleaner. Very happy with the price and product.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Solar pool cover
customer_reviews.text: Like the design and how easy it is to put over the pool. I will give it a few days to see if it really helps the warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this solar cover
customer_reviews.text: My first one lasted 2 and a half seasons in Pa. I thought that was pretty good so I ordered the same one on amazon for $17 dollars less than Wal-Mart had it. It does keep the water warmer and it’s easy to just roll to the side of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie D Catalina

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Although this was less money it is substantially a lower grade cover. Would work for a year or two max. Will buy a thicker , heavier one next time. But the cover was correct size and nice dark color so no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: mark r.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We received the solar pool cover today, and immediatly put it on the pool. There were holes/tears where the seams are. We would like a replacement as this won't function properly. I hope this was just a manufacturing error, and not a testimony to the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works it does keep your pool warmer
customer_reviews.text: I liked it it just keep your pool warmer so I consider that a win although I did get a hole in it but not too bad
customer_reviews.author: brian watson

customer_reviews.title: This solar cover really does it's job!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 22ft above ground round pool. It took some time to get a system down to get it off and on by myself but if you roll it tight and drag and fold it in half its pretty easy. It stays afloat in massive rain and hail storms even stays on in spring winds . I would definitely recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Quickly became a mess of plastic
customer_reviews.text: All the air pockets lost their air after 3 months of use. We are careful to remove, roll up and put back, so it's not abuse. After 3 months of use it was basically a floating piece of plastic - no longer ballast by the air bubbles. I will not be buying one from here again. Look elsewhere unless you want a slab of plastic suspended on your pool.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing price for a solar cover so I expected little
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing price for a solar cover so I expected little. Once it arrived I was so impressed with the quality of the cover I recommended it to a friend of mine and bought a second one to put in storage. We had a heat stretch a few weeks ago and the water in my pool was over 95 degrees so it works as it is supposed to, since I put it on my pool I have not had water below 80.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap- not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: We had this cover on our pool for less than 3 days, only took it off once and the seams are already coming apart. Sending it back. Was unable to get a hold of seller
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I've had an above ground pool for years but it's positioned underneath a shady tree so it wouldn't ever get warm enough to enjoy
customer_reviews.text: This thing actually works! I've had an above ground pool for years but it's positioned underneath a shady tree so it wouldn't ever get warm enough to enjoy living in Chicago... That is until now! Only thing, it's easy to take off but I strongly recommend using two to put it back on if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany & John Merriman

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This solar blanket really works! As long as you have a sufficient amount of sunshine and some long, warm days, the blanket will heat the water up very well. Last year, our pool was too cold for my kids to comfortably swim for long periods. This year, the same pool was so warm, they could spend all afternoon in it! Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: BeckyRDH

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! It works so well! My kids weren't using our pool because they would say it was too cold. I decided to try this product and it warned my pool up nicely. I can't keep my kids out of the pool now! I am so glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: B-dog69

customer_reviews.title: It went in the trash after one season.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all with the quality. It almost immediately began to disintegrate. It tore from the sides in several places. The bubbles also fell apart, so I had little blue plastic pieces in my filter every day. It went in the trash after one season.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B. Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have bought numerous other solar pool covers over the years. I really like the quality of this pool cover . The seams were welded together instead of stitched, which really matters when you trim the cover to exactly fit your pool. The other pool covers started to come apart after a few uses. I also really liked the warranty that comes with this pool cover. It was a deciding factor in my choice to purchase this pool cover. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ruru

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Has increased temp in the pool by at least 10 degrees. We put it on at night and take it off when we use it in the day usually by noon or so. Very happy so far. It is annoying to put on and take off so may get some type of crank or at least holder for it for next year if it continues to perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, Poor Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought cover in April 2016. I used it for the summer of 2016 and 2017. We live in the North Ga. Mountains so we only use the pool 5 months out of the year and put a winter cover on the pool for the other months. The solar cover came apart the second season. All theses little pieces from the bubbles floating in the pool and clogging the skimmer. Poor product, spend a little more and get one from Rec Warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Jack M

customer_reviews.title: Works like it is suppose to
customer_reviews.text: I've had bubble covers for inground pools in the past so I knew what to expect. It is lightweight enough to pull on and off by myself. It certainly helps keep debris out. Most importantly, it really heats the pool. It helps to run the pump once it has heated because it circulates the hotter water and allows the cover to heat even more water. Quality is very good. The little kids wouldn't go in the pool before because it was too cold. Now it is hard to keep them out! (With supervision - of course!)
customer_reviews.author: C. Lavattiata

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this along with a solar heater that’s inline with the pump. That was a waste of money but this blanket has done so much to not only heat our pool but keep it warm. It has seriously added a couple months to our swimming season in the Northwest. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: John D Easterly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Not only heats the water but keeps the tree debris out of the water
customer_reviews.author: Laura Martin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY !!
customer_reviews.text: I had this cover for 3weeks and it started coming apart at the heat seal . I noticed the first time I took off but didn't think it was that bad until I looked closer and about 4 ft plus was apart and each time you touched it it just got worse and it was toward the middle so basically made it worthless . Highly don't recommend!! Definitely going to get the much thicker gauge if I get another at all !
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Williamson

customer_reviews.title: ... it for a few hours and it did a good job heating the top part of the pool - ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a few hours and it did a good job heating the top part of the pool - we didn't run our pump which I believe if we had the water would have warmed up throughout Our pool is 18 by 52 and the cover fits perfectly- easy to put on and easy to roll up and take off
customer_reviews.author: Tamarie

customer_reviews.title: This works incredibly well
customer_reviews.text: We have had our pool set up in the summer many times and barley used it because of the water temp, even with the regular cover that comes with the pool. While waiting for this cover to arrive our pool temp was around 60 degrees. After putting it on within a week it was up to 80 degrees. Now it maintains at about 82-86 degrees depending on how cool it gets at night. We love having this solar cover and feel it has made all the difference. Now we are all using the pool almost daily!
customer_reviews.author: Cor

customer_reviews.title: Really helps warm the water
customer_reviews.text: Works great really warms up the pool. We do need two people to put it on and take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Erin W.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! This works really well to warm the water. We put this on and it took a day to raise the water temp to 86. We also use this for a general pool cover and it works great even in very strong winds. Can be put on by one person and is pretty light. *** Make sure you run the pump when this is on to help circulate the warm water.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Works great. In the 90+ heat we've been having, it actually makes the water a bit too warm during the day, but it's perfect by 7:30 p.m., when we usually swim. It definitely adds at least 5-7 degrees to the water and will prolong the swim season by at least a few weeks. The cover itself is durable and seems thicker than the Intex kind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so probably a good idea to leave off sometimes
customer_reviews.text: These heat your pool up bigtime. ..so probably a good idea to leave off sometimes..our pool is saltwater n never had a water quality problem until this cover. .I think it just got too warm. So keep k eye on your temp w the cover. Otherwise, super easy to get on n off by yourself which is nice..N if your looking for warm water , this will b great.
customer_reviews.author: AprilH

customer_reviews.title: This cover works great for our pool and much better than the cover ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover works great for our pool and much better than the cover that came with the Intex pool we have. It stays on the pool when it is windy or severe weather comes. Plus it helps heat up the pool a bit depending on how deep your pool is.
customer_reviews.author: MamaGreen

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: I did not have a cover on my 20 foot Intex pool last year, and the water never got above 70 degrees. Decided to give this cover a shot this year. The temp went up about 8 degrees in 3 days. I kept it covered while the filter was running (as the other reviews suggested) as well as overnight. We did have a week of 80 degree weather, so not sure if it was the cover alone or that also. But I'm happy either way. It's now a comfortable temp and we have removed the cover for good!
customer_reviews.author: April T.

product_meta.title: Blue Wave NS105 8-mil Solar Blanket, 15' x 15' x 0.5" H
product_meta.description: Size:15' x 15' x 0.5" HReduce chemical and water evaporation with our 8-mil Solar Blanket for Round Above-Ground Pools. In order to optimize heat retention, this blanket has an opaque, blue color that allows the maximum amount of sunlight to reach the water. This innovative technology can increase your pool’s temperature up to 15 degrees Fahrenheit. Thermal bubbles retain warmth even after the sun is gone, keeping pool water warm through cloudy days and cool nights. Our blankets are UV-protected and are designed to withstand years of direct sunlight. Backed by a 3-Year Warranty, our solar blankets surpass Intex pool covers in durability and performance.
feature_bullets: RETAINS HEAT - Insulating thermal cells trap heat and retain warmth on cool cloudy days allowing you to swim in warmer water all summer long.
LONG-LASTING - Created with UV-protected polymer, our solar blankets are resistant to the deterioration caused by chemicals and UV radiation.
EXTENDS THE SEASON - This high-quality 8-mil solar blanket uses passive heating to raise your swimming pool’s temperature by up to 15 degrees Fahrenheit.

3-YEAR WARRANTY - Your product comes with a 3-year manufacturer warranty. Your item will arrive damage free with all necessary parts and accessories. If something goes wrong, we'll work tirelessly until you're satisfied with your product.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,478 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
